enchantment.uniquee.all.desc: 在基礎鋒利上打磨出來的更高級的銳利
enchantment.uniquee.sages_blessing.desc: Increases XP but your Exhaustion increases from time to time
enchantment.uniquee.ender_eyes.desc: 讓你能夠盯著終界使者看而不會吸引到仇恨（就像戴著南瓜頭一樣）
enchantment.uniquee.focus_impact.desc: 增加傷害，對於攻擊速度越慢的武器增加的傷害越高（對於攻擊速度太高的武器反而會降低傷害）
enchantment.uniquee.bone_crusher.desc: 對骷髏造成更高比例的傷害，掉落雙倍的骨頭
enchantment.uniquee.ranged.desc: 延長你的攻擊和挖掘距離，但是當你使用延長的距離擊中目標時會降低傷害，挖掘方塊時會降低挖掘速度。
enchantment.uniquee.treasurers_eyes.desc: With this Enchantment you'll see Special Effects on Entities depending on the Enchantments on it. Only certain Enchantment have Effects
enchantment.uniquee.swiftblade.desc: 增加傷害。攻擊速度越快的武器增加的傷害越高（對於攻擊速度太低的武器反而會降低傷害）
enchantment.uniquee.spartanweapon.desc: 在你裝備盾牌的時候，攻擊造成額外的穿甲傷害（該傷害無視護甲）
enchantment.uniquee.perpetualstrike.desc: 持續攻擊一個目標將提高傷害
Weapons will react to temperature and receive effects of the counterpart.
enchantment.uniquee.momentum.desc: Continued mining will further increase your Mining Speed per Block mined. Accelerates faster with higher levels and Block Hardness
enchantment.uniquee.ender_mending.desc: 修補的強化版本，超出的經驗值將會被儲存到工具裡。終界修補將會把經驗分配給所有擁有終界修補和修補的裝備。
enchantment.uniquee.smart_ass.desc: 在破壞砂礫，沙和原木的時候，會先破壞它們最頂部的對應方塊（比如沙頂部有其他方塊，則只破壞最頂部的沙），有最大生效距離，等級越高，距離越遠
enchantment.uniquee.warriorsgrace.desc: 殺掉生物會慢慢修復耐久
enchantment.uniquee.naturesgrace.desc: Standing near Leaves will restore Health as long as the Player didnt receive Damage recently
enchantment.uniquee.fastfood.desc: Living Animals/Passives wont drop anything but therefore replenish Hunger, affected by Looting and fire
enchantment.uniquee.endermarksmen.desc: 用弓箭擊中一個目標時，將會恢復耐久度並返還箭矢（只對弓箭生效！）
enchantment.uniquee.cloudwalker.desc: Sneaking changes the Mode(Toggle). When active, the Player can no longer fall for a while. Consumes Durability while active
enchantment.uniquee.aresblessing.desc: 致命傷害將會轉化為損失護甲耐久度，但是仍然會受到跌落傷害和魔法傷害
enchantment.uniquee.alchemistsgrace.desc: 擊中一個目標的時候會給予你藥水效果（效果隨等級提升）
enchantment.uniquee.ecological.desc: 待在木頭（原木）或者樹葉旁邊的時候，會慢慢恢復該裝備耐久（必須同一高度）
enchantment.uniquee.phoenixs_blessing.de: 在你死亡的時候，讓你滿狀態復活（工具會被消耗，並給予你吸收和回復效果）
enchantment.uniquee.midas_blessing.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all of your Gold in your Inventory. Mining an oreGem will consume Gold but double the drops.
enchantment.uniquee.ifrits_grace.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all Lava/Magma related Blocks in you Inventory and store it as \"Lava Power\". Mining a Block will consume Lava Power mining an Ore will consume even more. Therefore the Drops will be smelted.
enchantment.uniquee.icarus_aegis.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all Feathers in your Inventory Fall Damage by gliding will be negated
enchantment.uniquee.ender_librarian.desc: Shift-Rightclicking with a Map will teleport you in a random spot in the Map. The Item will be consumed. Banners make it EXACT
enchantment.uniquee.endest_reap.desc: Deals bonus magic damage for every Reaped Stack. Gains a Stack for every 'higher being'
enchantment.uniquee.grimoire.desc: Improves Enchantments by Player's Knowledge. After this Enchantment is applied, every Enchantment added after will be removed(including Level increase)
enchantment.uniquee.pestilences_odium.de: Non-Hostile Entities in your area will be continuously damaged
enchantment.uniquee.deaths_odium.desc: Dieing while having this Curse in an active slot will cause you to lose some Base HP. Lost Base HP will be partially granted back as long as this Enchantment is on an active Slot..
tooltip.uniquee.stored.gold.name: Stored Gold: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.lava.name: Stored Lava: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.feather.name: Stored Feathers: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.repair.name: Stored Repairs: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.reap.name: 已儲存的§6【§4✦§4靈魂§4✦§6】: %s
